verbs.description: [ARG0: hawley] [V: blames] [ARG1: democrats] [ARG2: for incivility in politics in debate] missouri republican senate candidate josh hawley blamed democrats for a vitriolic political climate without offering any criticism of president donald trump during a thursday debate with democratic sen claire mccaskill the debate hosted by kmbc - tv in kansas city marked the final time the two squared off before the pivotal nov 6 election when the missouri race could be pivotal to party control of the u s senate it came amid the discovery of crude pipe bombs targeting prominent democratic politicians and cnn raising the specter of election - season violence largely unknown in the u s and highlighting increasingly heated political rhetoric clinton trump brett kavanaugh kansas city josh hawley donald trump hawley u s senate missouri cnn president sen claire mccaskill united states senate claire mccaskill
